text.b: Explicit Implementation of Predictive Control Based on FPGA

page.text: A. AGUILERA*, M. RODRÍGUEZ*, T. VILLEGAS**, W. COLMENARES**
Abstract: - This paper presents an explicit predictive control strategy based on FPGA, to monitor the status of
the slogans during an industrial process by using a table of positions, in order to optimize the time it takes
to control actions. The system has been specified using graphical programming, conversion modules analog -
digital (A/ D) and digital - analog (D/A). The modified functions are found from the prediction error obtained
from model identification. MATLAB ® was used as a work platform to carry out the process of designing and
testing the system controller and its development. The results show that the controller designed is quite useful.
